name: T - Nelson Noah
_source: speak;Nelson; Gah! The tax collector!{w} How did you find me all the way out here?!
speak;Noah; Wh- I'm not tax collector,{c:bop_portrait;Noah} I'm a retired knight!{w} I can see from a mile away that you're some thug,{w} so I'm making a citizen's arrest!
speak;Nelson; Oh thank heavens. I thought you were a part of the government.{w} Don't bother asking which one. I owe them all money by now.
speak;Noah; I overheard your confession to Emma about stealing that coin{tgm}...{tgm}{w} I can't allow it, even if you're stealing from our enemy.
speak;Noah; A thief is a thief!
speak;Nelson; You see, I think it's more a matter of perspective, and-
speak;Noah; Save the silver tongue for someone who cares.
speak;Nelson; I don't suppose you'll accept money to leave me alone, will you?

speak;Nelson; How about you watch over me while I hope you all,{w} so you can make sure I don't pull any funny business?{w} And under your close watch, I can{tgm}...{tgm} reform. Or something like that.
speak;Noah; Fine, but my eyes are going to be glued to you.{w} And stay away from my daughters.
speak;Nelson; Why does everyone want me to stay away from their daughters?{w} And why can't I find any sane people as of late?;;;thought_bubble;no_talk
